name: Team Rocket’s Arbok
author: Teeziro
flavor_text: The pattern on its belly appears to be a frightening face. Weak foes will flee just at the sight of the pattern.

abilities.name: Potent Glare
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent can’t play any Pokémon that has an Ability from their hand, except for Team Rocket’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spinning Tail
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
